name: The Adventures Of Squash
description: The Adventures Of Squash if my very first video game I made. I made everything except for the music. This is the first version of the game and I definitely  would appreciate some feedback on the game. Thank you. Please check out patrick de arteaga for more of his music: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCDGnOsTBqehvJxW-uSYPEMQ
